item.description:
Keep celebrating St. Patrick's Day with the Ice Cream Social, the "pirate/comedian/celtic music" band.Keep celebrating St. Patrick's Day with the Ice Cream Social at All Asia. Whether you're hungover, still drunk, or sober as a judge, this show will provide you with some great folk rock and pop rock music.

Also on the bill is Force the Fallen (friends of ICS), Kaplan Hasanoglu and Steve Chang, and is hosted by Karmic Music.

Show is 21+, $8/door admission or $5/advance. Email IceCreamSocialDuo@gmail.com with your FIRST & LAST Name to be put on the advance ticket list. Whether you're hungover, still drunk, or sober as a judge, this show will provide you with some great folk rock and pop rock music.

They were terrific at Bull McCabe's!

http://www.facebook.c...
item.name: All Asia (central Square)
